name: react4xp-buildconstants
description: React4xp helper: creates a JSON file with shared constants that define and setup a React4xp project.

scripts.clean: npm run cleanBin && npm run cleanEnsure && npm run cleanIndex && npm run cleanTestBuild && npm run cleanTestOutput
scripts.pretest: npm run eslint && npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run compile
scripts.test: NODE_PATH=./ mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --require test/test_helper.js "test/**/*@(.js)" && mkdir test/output/cli; bin/cli.js test/output/cli && path-exists test/output/cli/react4xp_constants.json && path-exists test/output/cli/build/resources/main/lib/enonic/react4xp/react4xp_constants.json

author: Espen Norderud
